程序包 model.mapping

类 VideoMapping

java.lang.Object
model.mapping.VideoMapping
public class VideoMapping
extends java.lang.Object
Map Video data to JSON database. This "JSON database" is a self-defined database and it should only be used in this software.
Offering add, delete, modify and find methods for video data. In this class, we use JSON to manage our Video POJO.
从以下版本开始:
20 May 2021
版本:
1.2
作者:
Yubo Wu
另请参阅:
JSON, Video

  • 方法详细资料

    • addVideo

      private static int addVideo​(Video video, java.lang.String videoOriginalPath, java.lang.String coverSrcPath) throws java.io.IOException, it.sauronsoftware.jave.EncoderException
      Add Video to database.
      It can copy the original video file to VIDEO_PATH and copy the cover image to COVER_PATH.
      After copying the files, it will generate video automatically and stores it in database.
      参数:
      video - instance of Video
      videoOriginalPath - the original path of the video file
      coverSrcPath - the path of the cover image
      返回:
      ORIGINAL_VIDEO_FILE_NOT_FOUND , DUPLICATE_ID, NOT_MP4, SUCCESS
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur
      it.sauronsoftware.jave.EncoderException - an error occurred while parsing the MP4 file

    • add

      public static int add​(Video video, java.lang.String videoOriginalPath) throws it.sauronsoftware.jave.EncoderException, java.io.IOException
      It will add video with the default cover image, DEFAULT_COVER.
      参数:
      video - the instance of Video
      videoOriginalPath - the original path of the video file
      返回:
      ORIGINAL_VIDEO_FILE_NOT_FOUND , DUPLICATE_ID, NOT_MP4, SUCCESS
      抛出:
      it.sauronsoftware.jave.EncoderException - an error occurred while parsing the MP4 file
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur
      另请参阅:
      addVideo(Video, String, String)

    • add

      public static int add​(Video video, java.lang.String videoOriginalPath, java.lang.String coverOriginalPath) throws java.io.IOException, it.sauronsoftware.jave.EncoderException
      Add video with a custom cover image.
      参数:
      video - the instance of Video
      videoOriginalPath - the original path of the video file
      coverOriginalPath - the original path of the cover image
      返回:
      ORIGINAL_VIDEO_FILE_NOT_FOUND , DUPLICATE_ID, NOT_IMAGE , NOT_MP4, SUCCESS
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur
      it.sauronsoftware.jave.EncoderException - an error occurred while parsing the MP4 file
      另请参阅:
      addVideo(Video, String, String)

    • delete

      public static int delete​(int id) throws java.io.IOException
      Delete video data (video data in database and also the video file).
      参数:
      id - the video ID
      返回:
      VIDEO_DATA_NOT_FOUND, VIDEO_FILE_NOT_FOUND , FILE_DELETE_ERROR, SUCCESS
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur

    • find

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Video> find​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> conditionMap) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Find Video from JSON database, and return the results to a ArrayList. The parameter are HashMap, you need to put all AND conditions in hashmap. This find method can't handle other conditions except AND, like OR or BETWEEN or others.
      参数:
      conditionMap - the WHERE conditions are represented by K-V pairs using HashMap
      返回:
      ArrayList contained results.
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - when DATA_PATH not found

    • findVideosByIdList

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Video> findVideosByIdList​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> idList) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • modify

      public static int modify​(Video video) throws java.io.IOException
      Update Video data in JSON database. The method need ID to locate where the data is so do not set a new value to the ID.
      NOTE: You can not use this method to modify coverSrc, src and time in Video.
      参数:
      video - instance of Video
      返回:
      VIDEO_DATA_NOT_FOUND or SUCCESS
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur

    • readAllVideos

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Video> readAllVideos() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Read DATA_PATH to the program and convert it to POJO using fastJSON.
      返回:
      all data in DATA_PATH
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - when DATA_PATH not found

    • writeAll

      private static void writeAll​(java.util.ArrayList<Video> videos) throws java.io.IOException
      Write all videos in ArrayList to the file using fastJSON. This method will overwrite the DATA_PATH file, so this method is set to be private to protect the data.
      参数:
      videos - the Video data that you want to write
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur
